favourite.article: Lord Jesus, though in tears while I’m obeying, Yet I would not change my standing; All I long for is the peace Thy love would bring. All I yearn for is Thy coming And Thy presence’ sweet embrace. Dear Lord Jesus,thou are my love and satisfaction, Thou are my everlasting portion, Nothing else would I pursue. Who like Thee—so sweet and lovely? None can e’er compete with Thee!
'Tis my love to be Thy bondslave, 'Tis my joy to Thee obey.

"Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus, Thou hast won each love from me; Who like Thee—so fair and comely? Who like Thee—so sweet and lovely? Matchless One, unrivaled beauty, None can e’er compete with Thee!" I love You dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus!!! None can ever compete with Thee...

The Lord has won our heart! We have this precious, matchless One inside of us! From withing our heart we can enjoy His voice, calling us again and again away from all the other loves, casting away all our hard feelings and causing us to rejoice in Him and be at peace with Him and ourselves. We become His eternal pleasure, and He becomes our satisfying portion for ever. Hallelujah!

Dear Lord Jesus! Precious Jesus! What a privilege to be Your bond-slave! Your beauty makes all other loves just fade away. All I yearn for is Thy coming when I can get that sweet embrace in Person! Praise You, Dear Lord Jesus, for Your preciousness to those who surrender all to You!
May God JHWH hear your prayer, grant your wish. Amen.
Very strong words here. Sometimes we go through difficult times but the good part is that God is still with us, His love is so deep.
